query:
-- Verificar tipos de movimentação existentes
SELECT 
  movementType,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN toLocationId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as saidas,
  SUM(CASE WHEN fromLocationId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as entradas,
  SUM(CASE WHEN fromLocationId IS NOT NULL AND toLocationId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as transferencias
FROM inventoryMovements
GROUP BY movementType
ORDER BY total DESC;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 44TTARZqZm4zxSK.6207e12656da --database YB8JBMXFWs4i38ecUvjPnS --execute 
-- Verificar tipos de movimentação existentes
SELECT 
  movementType,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN toLocationId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as saidas,
  SUM(CASE WHEN fromLocationId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as entradas,
  SUM(CASE WHEN fromLocationId IS NOT NULL AND toLocationId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as transferencias
FROM inventoryMovements
GROUP BY movementType
ORDER BY total DESC;
